list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make white or pale by extracting color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cold light blanched her face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ánh sáng lạnh che mặt cô

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: flinch or grow pale from shock, fear, or a similar emotion.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many people blanch at the suggestion
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều người Blanch tại đề nghị

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: briefly immerse (an item of food) in boiling water, especially as a technique for removing the skin from nuts or fruit or for preparing vegetables for further cooking.
